does_not_exist.title: Invalid product
does_not_exist.text: This product does not exist. Maybe you just saw it in a dream!
does_not_exist.alt: A guy sleping in a bed shaped like a dollar bill.

out_of_stock.title: Product not available
out_of_stock.text: This product is temporally sold out. We are running to our warehouse to get more!
out_of_stock.alt: A guy running desperately almost spilling his coffe.
